name: Sentelium - Proof of Concept
description:
Sentelium is a passion project that I have been working on when I have time, in between work and family.  I have also been doing all development solo, as such assets are simple for the time being and some are simply place holders until I am able to finish.

Sentelium is a portmanteau of the words Sentient and Mycelium(fungal root structure) and as such will have a fungal theme to a large chunk of the enemies you will encounter. It will also have a resource management aspect, which may not come in to play in this proof of concept due to balancing. The energy used for your shields is also the same energy that is used for your weapons.

Controls:

  • Can be controlled by keyboard or gamepad(x box style)
  • Movement - Arrow Keys, D-Pad, or Left Analog Stick
  • Blade - Left Alt or Left Trigger
  • Gun - Left Ctrl or Right Trigger
  • Jump - Space or A
  • Enter Door - Up Arrow or Up on D-Pad (Small issue with up on analog stick)
  • Interact with items/save stations - Enter or Y
  • Run/Sprint - Left Shift or X
  • Menu - Esc or Start Button
  • Select Option - Enter or A
  • Cancel/Exit Menu - Esc or B
